mapper.select: select f.favorite_name,f.id as id,count(f.content_id) as mcount from (select w.*,m.content_id from writer_cms_favorite w left join cms_user_mark m on w.id=m.favorite_id ) f where f.writer_id=#{writerId} GROUP BY f.favorite_name

select c.id as cid, c.title, c.author_id , w.realname, w.avatar, c.gmt_create, c.mid, c.summary , c.likes, c.clicks, c.comments, c.bookmarks, m.id as markId from cms_user_mark m LEFT JOIN cms_content c on m.content_id=c.id LEFT JOIN writer_user w on c.author_id=w.id where m.favorite_id=#{parameter.favoriteId} and m.writer_id=#{parameter.writerId} limit #{start},#{pageSize}
select count(m.content_id) from cms_user_mark m LEFT JOIN cms_content c on m.content_id=c.id where m.favorite_id=#{favoriteId} and m.writer_id=#{writerId}
select count(id) from cms_user_like where content_id=#{contentId} and writer_id=#{writerId}
mapper.delete: delete from cms_user_like where content_id=#{contentId} and writer_id=#{writerId}
mapper.update: update cms_content set likes=#{likes} where id=#{contentId}
